title: Stantonbury
description: A group of four Roman buildings that includes a bathhouse with a hypocaust was discovered in 1957 and 1958. These remains indicated the presence of a Roman-style villa. The remains date from the second to fourth centuries A.D.

properties.description: Location of the modern associated administrative center based on a node derived from OpenStreetMap.
properties.title: OSM location of modern Stantonbury
